memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, Loop< T > &XLoop, Forcing< float > XForcing, Model< T > XModel)
memberdef.name: FlowGPU

briefdescription.para: Main GPU flow solver for the flood model.

detaileddescription.para: Executes predictor and corrector steps, applies atmospheric, wind, and river forcing, updates advection and friction terms, and manages halo and gradient reconstruction for all blocks using CUDA kernels and streams.

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, Loop< float > &XLoop, Forcing< float > XForcing, Model< float > XModel)
memberdef.name: FlowGPU< float >

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, Loop< double > &XLoop, Forcing< float > XForcing, Model< double > XModel)
memberdef.name: FlowGPU< double >

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, Loop< T > &XLoop, Forcing< float > XForcing, Model< T > XModel)
memberdef.name: HalfStepGPU

briefdescription.para: Debugging GPU flow step for the flood model.

detaileddescription.para: Runs a simplified flow step for debugging the main engine, including forcing, advection, friction, and halo/gradient reconstruction using CUDA kernels and streams.

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, Loop< float > &XLoop, Forcing< float > XForcing, Model< float > XModel)
memberdef.name: HalfStepGPU< float >

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, Loop< double > &XLoop, Forcing< float > XForcing, Model< double > XModel)
memberdef.name: HalfStepGPU< double >

briefdescription.para: CUDA kernel to reset a variable array for all active blocks.

detaileddescription.para: Sets all values in the variable array to the specified reset value for each block and cell.
